page.title: 12FARMING 2
page.content: AS MENTIONED ON FARMING 1 A PROMINENT PART OF MUCH OF THE LAND IN THE WESTERN SECTION OF OUR AREA IS OWNED BY ONE FARM,'DUFFRYN FARM' KNOWN LOCALLY AS "THE FARM ON THE HILL!" THIS IS A MIXED FARM AS IT HAS BOTH HIGHLAND GRAZING AND LOWLAND PASTURES.THE FARM PRIDES ITSELF ON ITS BOTH FINE SHEEP AND PRIZE BULLS. THE FARM IS RUN BY TWO BROTHERS AND MUCH OF THE WORK ON THE FARM AND IN THE FIELDS IS DONE BY OTHER MEMBERS OF THE FAMILY. MILK IS DELIVERED BY THE FARMER TO A LARGE PART OF LONGFORD AND BRYNCOCH VILLAGE.
